#summary The layer bgcolor attribute specifies the background color of the element.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [LayerElement <layer> element] > *bgcolor attribute*

== Usage ==

Do not use [LayerElement <layer>].  The `<layer>` element was introduced in [BrowserNetscape4 Netscape 4] and has never been supported by any other browser.

== Elements ==

You can use the `bgcolor` attribute on the following elements:

  * [BodyElement <body>]
  * [ColElement <col>]
  * [ColgroupElement <colgroup>]
  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
  * [MarqueeElement <marquee>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [TbodyElement <tbody>]
  * [TdElement <td>]
  * [ThElement <th>]
  * [TfootElement <tfoot>]
  * [TheadElement <thead>]
  * [TrElement <tr>]
